sense.def: Pathological Condition of li ji 痢疾 , free-flux illness, of a mucous bloody stool interspersed with undigested solid food. This is often the result of evil qi availing itself of a regular depletion. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 17: 脾胃大腸虛弱，而邪氣乘之，故為水穀痢也 , “The spleen, stomach and large intestine are depleted and weak so that evil qi can enter. This then results in water and grain free-flux-illness ”.
